mapper.select:
SELECT A.* ,(CASE WHEN A.PRINT_YN = 'N' THEN '출력요청' WHEN A.PRINT_YN = 'R' THEN '출력대기' WHEN A.PRINT_YN = 'Y' THEN '출력성공' WHEN A.PRINT_YN = 'F' THEN '출력실패' ELSE '-' END) AS PRINT_YN_STR FROM RFID_PRINT_HISTORY A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY PRINT_SEQ DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_PRINT_HISTORY A WHERE 1=1
